__e: Oh, why must this wedding happen so fast? The Holy Father wills it. (DOOR OPENING)
We're in the presence of the Lord we'II be reciting the words of Jesus Christ, our Savior and they make me nervous.
In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, and of all the saints and angels, I command you, say your name!
Listen, friend, help me in my trouble, for Christ's sake.

Lord, open now my heart by Your Holy Spirit, for the sake of Jesus Christ. So that I may learn from Your word to repent of my sins and to believe in life and death in Jesus, and every day to grow in holy life and living.
For Christ's sake, use your head!
